segments.text: Hi , Steven . You have finished a wonderful project recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah , A . Thank you for approving my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be proud . You'll gain a lot in the following job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I believe it , but I want to know if you will give me a raise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: B , talking about salary is not smart . You are a new manager and you'd better learn more professional skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right , boss , but I need specific confirm to keep the future work better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , You are such a good talker .
segments.speaker: S1
